channel.title: Just a quick question
channel.description: Hey guys, does anybody know a tutorial on adding the weapon stats interface (the big popup one once you click the button) to a delta server? I've already tried the search button and nothing relevant came up :/ p.s. the client I'm using does support the sprites for it, I just need to add it server sided.

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @Exussit Exussit
item.description:
@Exussit wrote:

Hey guys, does anybody know a tutorial on adding the weapon stats interface (the big popup one once you click the button) to a delta server? I’ve already tried the search button and nothing relevant came up
p.s. the client I’m using does support the sprites for it, I just need to add it server sided.

Read full topic
